Text: As discussedThe career consultant that my friend is using is Mike Neves Professional Career Consulting

RE Retail service in MaineWe are to large commercials and industrials Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Tuesday November PM To Moore Janet H Subject Retail service in Maine We are considering submitting a bid to provide standard offer service to commercial and industrial end users Can you tell me if EPMI is licensed to provide retail service in Maine If you arent the right person who should I ask Thanks bunches Kay

RE Retail Licenses Disclosures Required thereunder Cc No I confirmed with Ed Baughman re PA and Mike Curry re TX and EPMI has no current retail deals in those states Janet Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Wednesday December PM To Moore Janet H Subject RE Retail Licenses Disclosures Required thereunder Janet Do you know if we have any deals in Texas or Penn which might be impacted by a license suspension I know thats a tough question Kay Original Message From Moore Janet H Sent Tuesday December PM To Mann Kay Cc Sager Elizabeth Subject Retail Licenses Disclosures Required thereunder Kay As requested this draft memo summarizes disclosures that EPMI must make to maintain its retail licenses Please let me know if you need more information JHM File RetailBankruptcyDisclosDOC

Suggested revisions to EOL Paperless Confirm Amendment textAfter discussions with Elizabeth Sager and Leslie Hansen we have developed a few additions to the EOL Paperless Confirm Amendment form to clarify that neither party shall not just that neither party is required to send paper confirms and the transactions records on EOL control over any conflicting terms in the underlying Governing Agreement I have attached a draft below of a Consent and Agreement for Idacorp with the proposed changes in italics see Para ai and We made this last change in anticipation of revised EOL power product definitions which new definitions will conflict with important terms such as the force majeure clause in the Power Master If you dont want any of these proposed changes to be made to the form as a whole and would prefer that they be handled in the Power Annex so as to apply only to Power please let me know Janet

RE EntergyKoch Trading LPOriginal Message From Taylor Mark E Legal Sent Friday August PM To Shackleton Sara Moore Janet H Subject FW EntergyKoch Trading LP Ill let you guys decide who takes first crack at this one Original Message From Dickson Stacy E Sent Tuesday July PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Cc Theriot Kim S Subject EntergyKoch Trading LP Mark Attached is the EOL amend for EntergyKoch formerly Axia Janet has not seen this amendment either Stacy File EntergyKoch EOLamenddoc

ONEOK EOL Amendment Cc Mark Im not sure whether this CP does financial trading Regardless Ive included the highlighted language that I had circulated with the Idacorp draft I think that you were mulling over whether that new language was acceptable Please let us know your thoughts so that we can finalize the new rider THANKS Stacy Would you like to tackle ONEOK next Also please let me know your thoughts on the bold faced language Janet

RE EntergyKoch Trading LPOriginal Message From Taylor Mark E Legal Sent Friday August PM To Shackleton Sara Moore Janet H Subject FW EntergyKoch Trading LP Ill let you guys decide who takes first crack at this one Original Message From Dickson Stacy E Sent Tuesday July PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Cc Theriot Kim S Subject EntergyKoch Trading LP Mark Attached is the EOL amend for EntergyKoch formerly Axia Janet has not seen this amendment either Stacy File EntergyKoch EOLamenddoc

Suggested revisions to EOL Paperless Confirm Amendment textAfter discussions with Elizabeth Sager and Leslie Hansen we have developed a few additions to the EOL Paperless Confirm Amendment form to clarify that neither party shall not just that neither party is required to send paper confirms and the transactions records on EOL control over any conflicting terms in the underlying Governing Agreement I have attached a draft below of a Consent and Agreement for Idacorp with the proposed changes in italics see Para ai and We made this last change in anticipation of revised EOL power product definitions which new definitions will conflict with important terms such as the force majeure clause in the Power Master If you dont want any of these proposed changes to be made to the form as a whole and would prefer that they be handled in the Power Annex so as to apply only to Power please let me know Janet

RE BP EOL Consent Name Change Cc Mark You probably would have caught this anyway but it looks like BP Amocos your CPs name has changed Janet Original Message From Theriot Kim S Sent Thursday July AM To Moore Janet H Cc Hunter Larry Joe Subject FW BP EOL Consent See message belowLooks like BP changed their name to BP Corporation North America Inc Original Message From Hunter Larry Joe Sent Thursday July AM To Theriot Kim S Wallumrod Ellen Murphy Melissa Ann Reeves Leslie Subject RE BP EOL Consent Kim Can you inform Janet that BP has changed its name recently New name is BP Corporation North America Inc Thanks Joe Original Message From Theriot Kim S Sent Thursday July AM To Wallumrod Ellen Murphy Melissa Ann Hunter Larry Joe Reeves Leslie Subject FW BP EOL Consent Heres BP Amoco Shes on fire today Hope the other attorneys are too Original Message From Moore Janet H Sent Thursday July AM To Dickson Stacy E Cc Taylor Mark E Legal Theriot Kim S Subject BP EOL Consent Mark and Stacy Because paragraph of our form contemplates that there are annexes attached if there end up being none after each group has had its input I suggest that the last attorney reviewing the agreement delete that paragraph Note that Power has no Annex to attach to BPs version Thanks File BPEOLConsentdoc
Revised AEPEOL paperless confirm agreement Cc I tweaked the one that I sent you yesterday Heres the final version Janet
